title: Square, 6th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen carried in pairs, Z-spun linen, Z-spun wool, Z-spun silk
Technique: slit tapestry
description: Central scene of Dionysius with wine bowl and dagger flanked by satyr and a dancing male. there are recumbent bacchantes at the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Square, 6th century.
6th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen carried in pairs, Z-spun linen, Z-spun wool, Z-spun silk
Technique: slit tapestry. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-107.
